will resurrect a hallowed nameplate- the Grand Wagoneer- in two years. "It's time we gave the market an upper-scale Grand Wagoneer," Chrysler CEO Sergio Marchionne said at the Detroit auto show. You'll see it in January 2013. The Grand Wagoneer would be a seven-seat SUV built on the same platform as the Grand Cherokee and the Dodge Durango.
